traits.name: Attacker
entries: Ayik gains a +2 bonus to all attack rolls (included below).

traits.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: Ayik is proficient with simple and martial weapons, shields, and all armor.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
